privacyCont: We assure total privacy for everyone who uses our services. We utilize user's code to seal your identity from the community and staff where necessary.

homeContent: You can fall, but you can rise also
visionCont: Our vision is of a world where Rwandans receive the mental health care they need; and go on to live productive and fulfilling lives.
missionParaOne: Aheza's mission is to listen, understand and support its clients.
missionParaTwo: Our qualified, trained staff are experienced in dealing with the full range of mental health conditions. We provide group therapy sessions; one-on-one counseling; and a range of holistic activities to compliment recovery.
missionParaThree: We also provide career counseling and entrepreneurship training.
PartnershipsParaOne: Aheza Healing & Career Center  works with a variety of organizations and businesses to raise awareness as well as offer mental health care to its clients.
PartnershipsParaTwo: Being a partner means supporting Aheza projects and  programs which are focused on
ForMore: For more information about how your business or organization can become a partner,
